nodes.text: Fallanter Gest was a male Human who worked as a scientist for the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. During the Quesh war on the planet Quesh, Gest was stationed at the Imperial Garrison.
Fallanter Gest appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Mods Vendor for Imperial players on Quesh.
